concept.title: Using Virtual Private Cloud
concept.shortdesc: Eucalyptus Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) is an implementation of Amazon VPC that allows you to define a logically isolated virtual network that can contain Eucalyptus resources. A virtual network enhances security by allowing you to have fine-grained, explicit control over network gateways, subnets, IP address ranges, and inbound and outbound connectivity. This section of the User Guide covers how Eucalyptus VPC works and how to use it.

conbody.note: For more information about Amazon Virtual Private Cloud, see the Amazon VPC documentation.
